short_summary: Custom CRM Application Development using Microsoft Power Platform
description: A Level 3 Application Architect with experience in designing and developing enterprise-grade CRM using Microsoft Power Platform and Dynamics 365. Project aims to design and deliver an custom CRM solution for the National Research Council Canada.
full_summary:
**TBIPS - Application/Software Architect**
=====================================================

### Call for Proposal (CFP)
The National Research Council Canada is seeking a qualified Application/Software Architect to collaborate on the design and development of an enterprise-grade customer relationship management (CRM) system using Microsoft Power Platform/Dynamics 365 and associated third-party add-ons.

### Tender Details
* **Bid Reference:** CB-672-82027223
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58265
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Publication Date:** March 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 15, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

### Scope of Work
The successful candidate will assist in the design and development of an enterprise-grade CRM system using Microsoft Power Platform/Dynamics 365 and associated third-party add-ons. This will involve collaborating with the client to define the requirements and architecture of the CRM system.

### Evaluation Criteria
The bids will be evaluated based on the combined score of technical merit and price. The highest combined score will receive the contract award.

### Relevant Trade Agreements
This contract is open to bidders from countries participating in the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contact Information
* Roxanne Azzi Abboud
* Email: [roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-299-9650

### Attachments
Tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34069/23-58265_npp_application-software-architect_amendment-1.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34069/23-58265_npp_application-software-architect.pdf
